mapper.sql: ${tableAlias}S_ID as "${columnPrefix}id", ${tableAlias}S_ATTRIBUTECODE as "${columnPrefix}attributeCode", ${tableAlias}S_ATTRIBUTERANGEVALUE as "${columnPrefix}attributeRangeValue", ${tableAlias}I_SORTID as "${columnPrefix}sortId", ${tableAlias}C_SYNFLAG as "${columnPrefix}synFlag", ${tableAlias}D_SYNDATE as "${columnPrefix}synDate", ${tableAlias}D_CREATETIME as "${columnPrefix}createTime", ${tableAlias}S_CREATEUSERCODE as "${columnPrefix}createUserCode", ${tableAlias}S_CREATEUSERNAME as "${columnPrefix}createUserName", ${tableAlias}D_DELTIME as "${columnPrefix}delTime", ${tableAlias}S_DELUSERCODE as "${columnPrefix}delUserCode", ${tableAlias}S_DELUSERNAME as "${columnPrefix}delUserName", ${tableAlias}C_FLAG as "${columnPrefix}flag", ${tableAlias}C_ISDEFAULT as "${columnPrefix}isDefault"
